main event: An observation of a meteoric object was reported in Karachi, Pakistan on 23 December 1954.
interesting points: The object was identified as a meteor based on the conclusion from the ONI report., The sighting was recorded as a ball of fire., The report referenced an article that appeared in a Karachi newspaper., The exact length of time for the observation was not reported., Details about an aircraft sighting were noted from 25 October 1954, but the location and heading were unknown.
